    private void jButton1ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         
        // TODO add your handling code here:
        String applicantid=jTextField1.getText();
        String applicantname=jTextField2.getText();
        String mobileno=jTextField3.getText();
        String country=jTextField4.getText();
        String pancardno=jTextField5.getText();
        String aadharcardno=jTextField6.getText();
        
        if(applicantid.equals("") || applicantname.equals("") ||mobileno.equals("") ||country.equals("")||pancardno.equals("")||aadharcardno.equals("")){
           JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(this , "Fields can't be empty");
           jTextField1.setText("");
           jTextField2.setText("");
           jTextField3.setText("");
           jTextField4.setText("");
           jTextField5.setText("");
           jTextField6.setText("");
          
           
      /*  }else if(pass.equals("") && jPasswordField2.getText().equals("")){
           JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(this , "Fields can't be empty");
           jTextField1.setText("");
           jPasswordField1.setText("");
           jPasswordField2.setText("");
        }else if(username.equals("") && jPasswordField2.getText().equals("")){
           JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(this , "Fields can't be empty");
           jTextField1.setText("");
           jPasswordField1.setText("");
           jPasswordField2.setText("");
        }else if( jPasswordField2.getText().equals("")){
           JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(this , "Fields can't be empty");
           jTextField1.setText("");
           jPasswordField1.setText("");
           jPasswordField2.setText("");       */
           
        }
        else {
        try {
            
            Class.forName("org.apache.derby.jdbc.ClientDriver");
            Connection con=(Connection) DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:derby://localhost:1527/DB", "root", "root");
            PreparedStatement ps=(PreparedStatement) con.prepareCall("insert into register(id,name,mob,country,pan,aadhar) values (?,?,?,?,?,?)");
            ps.setString(1, applicantid);     
            ps.setString(2, applicantname);
            ps.setString(3, mobileno);
            ps.setString(4, country);
            ps.setString(5, pancardno);
            ps.setString(6, aadharcardno);
            ps.executeUpdate();
            
           // jButton2.setText("You can login now..!");
            JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(this, "Applicant registered successfully");
            Home h=new Home();
                    h.setVisible(true);
                    this.dispose();
        }catch (SQLException e) {
            System.err.println("SQL exception");
            JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(this, "Registration Failed! Try again!!");
        }
            
        catch(ClassNotFoundException e){
            System.out.println("class not found");
        }
        }

    }                                        

    private void jTextField3ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {

    }

        // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                           

    private void jButton2ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         
        // TODO add your handling code here:
        JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(this,"Click Register to enter your Registration Details");
         Home h=new Home();
                    h.setVisible(true);
                    this.dispose();
    }                                        

    private void jTextField2ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                            
        // TODO add your handling code here:
    }
